src:
desde el lunes
Alberto Avellaneda expondrá en Frías

07 Nov 2019, 17:36

El periodista y documentalista R. Alberto Avellaneda tendrá dos jornadas en la Escuela Normal "República del Ecuador", para presentar el arte pictórico ancestral del Oriente Catamarqueño, y realizar tareas de extensión periodística cultural.
El lunes 11 de noviembre, a las 20, apertura de la exposición "Senderos Ancestrales de Memoria - de la Mano del Abuelo".Luego, la serie de homenajes "Solo No Lo Hubiere Conseguido", reconociendo el aporte de instituciones y personas que tuvieron incidencia en la formación profesional del autor.
El martes 12, de 9 a 12 y de 17 a 21, actividades periodistas de extensión cultural, para hacer conocer y propender a la preservación del patrimonio cultural ancestral, común a Catamarca y Santiago del Estero, con visitas guiadas abiertas a todo publico en la Escuela, destinadas a personal de los estamentos judiciales, policiales, docentes y alumnos primarios, secundarios y superiores de Frias y zonas vecinas.
text:
since Monday
Alberto Avellaneda will exhibit in Frías

07 Nov 2019, 17:36

The journalist and documentary maker R. Alberto Avellaneda will have two days at the Normal School "Republic of Ecuador", to present the ancestral pictorial art of the Catamarqueño East, and perform cultural journalistic extension tasks.
On Monday, November 11, at 20, opening of the exhibition "Ancestral Paths of Memory - from the Hand of Grandfather." Then, the series of tributes "Only No Would Have Got It", recognizing the contribution of institutions and people who had impact on the professional training of the author.
On Tuesday 12, from 9 to 12 and from 17 to 21, journalistic activities of cultural extension, to make known and tend to the preservation of the ancestral cultural heritage, common to Catamarca and Santiago del Estero, with guided tours open to all public in the School, destined to personnel of the judicial, police, teachers and primary, secondary and superior students of Frias and neighboring areas.
